content:
Why not just change the settings to the correct ones? They are: mail.shaw.ca, 587, STARTTLS, normal password, User Name = part of address before @.

https://support.shaw.ca/t5/internet-articles/about-pop-and-imap-email-server-settings/ta-p/6731

Are these 'profiles' actual profiles or accounts?
creator: sfhowes

content:
Yes these are 'profiles'. I.e. they all come from/to me as aliases.

Are you saying there is nothing special about the default profile's http://shawmail.vc.shawcable.net/ ? That it was not different from the others for some valid reason?

content:
Hello there We have read the question We try to help


I'm not getting any email on my computer pc.

The reason of not getting any email on the pc could be caused by a update or vpn service. Try to disconnect all these topics like antivirus , vpn , to check for mail after switching them on or off. Most regonised issues are after a update of Thunderbird , the previous program where trusted in the list of trusted software and the new installed software is not try to change this to erase the recent trusted version and put the new selected version on the list or wait after deleting it from the list of trusted programs list for the drop down box to follow. Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
Hello there

The program could contain normally configured filters on the pc that is holding down emails on the server it could be and can even be worse then that if it is that ,if the server is deleting them . Delete or refresh the bad filter s that is been in use with the program if they are present in or on that filterlist of thunderbird on the recent pc that is in use.

Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
Google sta ponendo restrizioni sempre più pesanti all'accesso a Gmail tramite client. Nel tuo caso i parametri sono corretti, solo che Google non ti fa completare il login tramite Oauth perché -per qualche ragione- il suo server va in errore

Se stai usando una vecchia versione di Thunderbird, assicurati di installare quella più recente. Verifica anche i parametri suggeriti in questa guida -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/index.php?topic=76956.0

In alternativa potresti provare con le password per applicazione (ma devi avere l'autenticazione a 2 fattori attiva) -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/index.php?topic=76522.0
creator: @next

content:
There is only one place which can setup/modify etc a password for an email address and that is in the webmail account which you access via a browser. If you cannot logon to webmail account there is usually a 'Forgotten Password' link which you need to use and follow instructions to regain access to webmail account.

Once you have set up password to access server then you can use it to create a mail account in Thunderbird.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: What server are you talking about ? Is this a outlook/hotmail/live/msn account or an account that uses microsoft office server ?
creator: Toad-Hall
